title: Dwight in Shining Armor
overview: After Dwight, a 21st-century teen, falls into an ancient, underground chamber, he awakens a warrior princess, her court magician, and many medieval villains that have been sleeping for a thousand years! Consequently, Dwight is now spellbound to protect Princess Gretta as her unconventional champion while her enemies from the past invade his hometown of Woodside.
